events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, demonstrating strong technical skills and relevant experience.
After review, the application was categorised under Engineering due to the candidate's background in software development and coding expertise.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to manage communication and schedule the upcoming interviews for the engineering role.
The initial screening call went well, with the candidate showing strong problem-solving capabilities and a good cultural fit for the engineering team.
The candidate promptly responded to follow-up questions about their previous software projects and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for next week to further assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating a thorough understanding of software architectures and problem-solving under pressure.
Following technical success, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's motivations and confirm alignment with company values.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate expressing strong interest in long-term growth and teamwork within the engineering department.
An offer was proposed to the candidate outlining a competitive salary and benefits package tailored to their experience in software development.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team and contributing to upcoming projects.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to start and contribute fully as a Software Engineer in our company.
Onboarding has commenced smoothly, with the candidate attending orientation sessions and beginning familiarization with engineering tools and processes.
The hiring process is formally closed as the new engineer has successfully joined the team and started the onboarding program.
